h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Adept Spine-Shooting Fuban Staff Location
content: The Adept Spine-Shooting Fuban Staff can be found in New Game Plus. It can be crafted at any point in your New Game Plus throughs, but you will need a lot of unique crafting materials.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Adept_Spine-Shooting_Fuban_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Adept Spine-Shooting Fuban Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Adept Spine-Shooting Fuban Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Adept Spine-Shooting Fuban Staff can be found in New Game Plus. It can be crafted at any point in your New Game Plus throughs, but you will need a lot of unique crafting materials.
